pullrequest.title: Added gui-client-plugin option. Leave -g to load System Plugins (issue #2279)

content.raw: It's not clear to me what the "deprecated" messages mean. Will we stop supporting system plugins onto the client? I don't think this behaviour should be deprecated, since system plugins provide some functionality which GUI plugins don't.
content.html: It's not clear to me what the "deprecated" messages mean. Will we stop supporting system plugins onto the client? I don't think this behaviour should be deprecated, since system plugins provide some functionality which GUI plugins don't.
